opis: Prodaje se kamena kuća s prostranom okućnicom i predivnim pogledom na Zatonsku valu. Kuća se prostire na 3 etaže i sastoji se od dvije zasebne stambene jedinice te garaže u prizemlju. U prizemlju se nalazi garaža, na prvom katu prostrani 2 sobni stan te na drugom katu (visoko potkrovlje) 3 sobni stan. Sa svakog kata se izlazi na terase i balkone s predivnim pogledom na more i Zaton. Kuća je građena u visokom standardu, zidana je bračkim kamenom te posjeduje sustav za solarno grijanje vode. Ukupna brutto kvadratura iznosi 277 m2 te uz kuću dolazi velika okućnica s terasama i vrtom iznad kuće. Ukupna površina zemljišta iznosi 698 m2 i do kuće se dolazi javnom asfaltiranom cestom. Izgradnja je završena 2007 godine te je uredno održavana i posjeduje uporabnu dozvolu. Vlasništvo i papiri uredni. Energetski certifikat je u izradi. Za sve dodatne informacije ili ukoliko ste zainteresirani pogledati objekt stojimo na raspolaganju. Agencijska provizija za kupca iznosi 2% +pdv. A beautiful stone built house with amazing views of the bay of Zaton. The house is spread over 3 floors and consists of two separate residential units and a garage. On the ground floor there is a large garage, first floor consists of a spacious 2 bedroom apartment and on the 2nd floor (high attic) there is a 3 bedroom apartment. From each floor doors lead onto terraces and balconies with amazing views of the sea and the bay. The house is built to a high standard, with stone from the island of Brač and there is also a solar water heating system installed. The total gross square footage of the house is 277 m2, it is surrounded with terraces and a garden above. Total size of the plot is 698 m2 and there is a public road leading up to it. The construction of the house was completed in 2007, it was regularly maintained and there is a usage permission. Owhership and deeds are all 100% in order. Energy certificate is in process of being obtained. For any additional information or if you would wish to see the property please feel free to contact us. Agency commission for the buyers is 2% + vat. ID KOD AGENCIJE: 49 Espresso nekretnine Mob: 098 1869 246, 091 504 2020 E-mail: info@espressonekretnine.hr www.espressonekretnine.hr
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
